EmailTemplate.subject: 46% Of VDI Projects Stall, Don't Let Yours Be One Of Them
EmailTemplate.textOnly: <[[http://vmturbo.com/thx-wp-assure-vdi-performance/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ENG-VDI&utm_content=Early02]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, Virtual Desktop Infrastructure (VDI) holds great promise for end-user computing teams to centralize management and maintenance, lower operational costs, improve security, and deliver flexibility to mobile workers. But did you know that 46% of VDI projects stall due to cost and performance issues? This fact emphasizes the need for a control system that delivers a desktop experience to end-users. The paper below explores some of the common challenges facing VDI planning, deployment and operations and how to avoid these costly challenges. <[[http://vmturbo.com/thx-wp-assure-vdi-performance/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ENG-VDI&utm_content=Early02]]> - The VMTurbo Team
